project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the Seed Sector Commercialization Project is to assist the government in developing a viable commercial seed sector, which can not only produce high quality seeds in sufficient quantity and variety to satisfy farmer needs but also operates through efficient, self-sustained commercial enterprises. The project will consist of the following components: 1) a seed policy and regulatory framework that will enhance the competitiveness of the seed sector and encourage international cooperation; 2) modernization, rationalization and commercialization of selected seed companies; and 3) institutional strengthening in order to provide effective service and technical support to the seed sector.

P003638.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>种子商业化项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是协助中国政府发展有活力的商业化种子行业，使其不仅能生产优质种子，从数量和品种上满足农户需求，而且也能通过高效且可自负盈亏的商业企业进行运作。本项目设有以下几个子项目：（1）种子政策法规框架子项目。该框架将增强种子行业的竞争力，鼓励开展国际合作；（2）种子公司现代化、合理化和商业化子项目；（3）机构加强子项目，其目的是向种子行业提供有效服务和技术支持。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
